title: DCing/Punishment
body:
Is there a reason why I am getting punished for my internet dcing?

Got VDSL installed recently, and have probably DCd twice in the past couple of weeks, and I have now gotten 20 minute queues?
Im sure riot can pick up on it being  a DC rather than it me being AFK?

replies.body: you're dcing and potentially ruining the game. they don't care if it's afk or dc, both ruin games for everyone else playing.
